item.title: 免费白嫖Office 365 E5，5TB onedrive空间！
item.description: 注册入口 https://developer.microsoft.com/zh-cn/microsoft-365/dev-program 1T改成5T https://admin.onedrive.com/?v=StorageSettings 添加新用户 https://admin.microsoft.com/ 续签API设置 https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/ActiveDirectoryMenuBlade/RegisteredApps E5续签软件下载 https://e5renew.com/
